title: Whose fault is that?
author: VD
content_html:
A complaint on the new National Socialist Review:

Subject “Neocon” Now Has No Meaning Part 3,717,206

You’re often noted that “neoconservative” has a very hazy definition. Indeed to some people it’s become what Orwell said of Fascism just another word for “bad’.

Perhaps Goldberg himself didn’t, but I do seem to recall a few NRO writers claiming that neocon was a synonym for “Jew”. Those who nonsenically expand definitions are in no position to complain about the definition is expanded beyond all usefulness.
content_text:
A complaint on the new
National Socialist Review
:
Subject “Neocon” Now Has No Meaning Part 3,717,206
You’re often noted that “neoconservative” has a very hazy definition. Indeed to some people it’s become what Orwell said of Fascism just another word for “bad’.
Perhaps Goldberg himself didn’t, but I do seem to recall a few NRO writers claiming that neocon was a synonym for “Jew”.  Those who nonsenically expand definitions are in no position to complain about the definition is expanded beyond all usefulness.
